World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 26 日星期一 06:08:41 GMT 120
Mexico president lambastes YouTube after company edits video revealing NYT journalist's numberMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador criticized YouTube on Sunday night after the tech company removed the video of a news conference in which the leader revealed the private telephone number of the New York Times' Mexico bureau chief. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 05:22:38 GMT ZIJTTT5PBNNOLPJBAGHZSM22JY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-president-lambastes-youtube-after-company-edits-video-revealing-nyt-2024-02-26/Reuters世界美洲
'Not in dreamland': WTO aims for modest outcomes at Abu Dhabi meetingTrade ministers from nearly every country in the world gather in Abu Dhabi on Monday for a World Trade Organization meeting that aims to set new global commerce rules, but even its ambitious chief Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala has sought to curb expectations. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 03:07:04 GMT A6QXSXLWIJMDXG5G5WR2JYHML4 https://www.reuters.com/world/not-dreamland-wto-aims-modest-outcomes-abu-dhabi-meeting-2024-02-26/Emma Farge, Rachna Uppal世界
Anti-Muslim hate speech soars in India, research group saysAnti-Muslim hate speech in India rose by 62% in the second half of 2023 compared to the first six months of the year, a Washington-based research group said on Monday, adding the Israel-Gaza war played a key role in the last three months. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 03:04:26 GMT J26KU3QWT5MX3PPMQ5RYX7MDUY https://www.reuters.com/world/india/anti-muslim-hate-speech-soars-india-research-group-says-2024-02-26/Kanishka Singh世界印度
US says Yemen's Houthis ballistic missile misses US tanker Torm ThorThe U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) said early on Monday that Yemen's Houthis launched one anti-ship ballistic missile likely targeting the MV Torm Thor, but missed the U.S.-flagged, owned and operated oil tanker, in the Gulf of Aden on Feb. 24. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 02:57:37 GMT BTGQRXFHNBOOJI7SX2YHZIVO64 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-says-yemens-houthis-ballistic-missile-misses-us-tanker-torm-thor-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中东
South Korea gives protesting doctors end-Feb deadline to return to workSouth Korea's government on Monday told young doctors they had until the end of February to return to work or risk being punished for staging a week-long protest that has disrupted services for patients at several major hospitals. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 02:43:11 GMT CU6WCNZ2G5OKJJC7IF4FKIANOA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/skorea-doctors-may-be-suspended-unless-they-return-work-official-2024-02-26/Jack Kim, Ju-Min Park世界亚太地区
New Zealand begins sentencing of those involved in White Island volcanic eruptionSentencing for the tour booking agents and managers of an island in New Zealand where a volcanic eruption killed 22 people, mostly tourists, in 2019 began on Monday, with the prosecutor warning those sentenced may not be able to pay a fine. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 02:34:49 GMT 3RRQLYGEUNNEDIL5KXKWACCWWM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-begins-sentencing-those-involved-white-island-volcanic-eruption-2024-02-26/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
Hungary set to ratify Sweden's NATO accession, clearing last hurdleHungary is expected to ratify Sweden's NATO accession on Monday, clearing the last hurdle before the historic step by the Nordic country whose neutrality lasted through two world wars and the simmering conflict of the Cold War. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 02:09:08 GMT W37LEVDDR5LX7IMMTJPTVJTZII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-set-ratify-swedens-nato-accession-clearing-last-hurdle-2024-02-26/Krisztina Than, Niklas Pollard世界欧洲
Canada's finance minister says pharmacare deal no fiscal threat, Globe and Mail reportsA "pharmacare" deal between Canada's ruling Liberals and the New Democrats (NDP) will not threaten the country's fiscal standing, Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland told a news conference on Sunday, The Globe and Mail reported. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 00:48:32 GMT OKZK4EYUJRK7LIZ3JYLCCHGUBU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canadas-finance-minister-says-pharmacare-deal-no-fiscal-threat-globe-mail-2024-02-26/Reuters世界美洲
South Korea doctors on mass walkout say they are overworked and unheardYoung doctors say their pay and working conditions should be the priority, rather than a government plan to boost physician ranks. Authorities say more staff are needed for remote areas and one of the world's most rapidly ageing societies. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 00:40:06 GMT OCBFZ4EJGFMVFHL7ATXD4N4BUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/overworked-unheard-south-korean-doctors-mass-walkout-say-2024-02-26/Ju-Min Park, Minwoo Park商业工作世界
China seeks to strengthen cooperation with New Zealand for CPTPP, commerce minister saysChina is willing to work with New Zealand to continue strengthening cooperation in the process of joining The Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, its commerce minister said. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 23:40:59 GMT DGNSCQ3FBJPAXO3BTCAMGFB6PM https://www.reuters.com/world/china-seeks-strengthen-cooperation-with-new-zealand-cptpp-commerce-minister-says-2024-02-25/Reuters世界
Taiwan ally Tuvalu names Feleti Teo as new prime ministerTuvalu on Monday announced former attorney general and fisheries official Feleti Teo as its new prime minister, after he was elected unopposed by lawmakers in the Pacific Islands nation, officials said. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 22:37:29 GMT RSW6LNS66JLUVJMJULRQMG2KYI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/tuvalu-name-new-prime-minister-monday-2024-02-25/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
